name: AppBaker
tag_list: mobile-development, mobile-apps, iphone, ipad, android, html5
overview:
AppBaker is an online app building service for agencies and traditional web developers to create customized mobile apps for their clients.

It offers a fast and inexpensive way to build and manage native iOS, Android and HTML5 apps, covering 100% of available mobile devices. AppBaker comes pre-loaded with UI components and modules to mix and match, a familiar drag-and-drop User Interface and does not require any coding. That makes it easier for developers new to mobile development to start building their apps. Perhaps one of the most important benefits of AppBaker is that it offers the actual device test experience with the AppBaker Player.

AppBaker is also known for its Starter Packs, its ready-made, industry-specific solutions for building branded apps. Starter packs are designed to simplify the process of building an app for industries like education, sports, radio, tourism, etc. Its Event Starter Pack is used by the TEDx industry worldwide to create apps for their TEDx events.

products.name: mobile app building in iOS, Android and HTML5
